form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: X-ray dated 2/93, MISTRY MANCHHABEN CHHABILDAS M 096107

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 MISTRY MANCHHABEN CHHABILDAS M 096107 X-ray dated 23/2/93 P.A. VIEW OF THE CHEST : There is scoliosis of the dorsal spine with its convexity to the right. There is evidence of fibrotic bands seen in the left infra-clavicular region. No other abnormality is detected in the chest. CONCLUSION: Scoliosis of dorsal spine. Fibrotic bands left infra-clavicular region most likely as a result of Koch's ?activity. sd/- DR.M. TAYABALI LABORATORY INVESTIGATION : Sputum for A.F.B. (1), (2) (3) : No mycobacteria detected by Z.N. and Fluorescent Stains. (dt.1.3.93), (dt.2.3.93), (dt.3.3.93) Mantoux Test (1:2000) : Positive 14mm x 12mm. (dt.1.3.93) E.S.R. (Westergren) : 40mm at the end of one hour. (dt.2.3.93) sd/-(MRS) F.E. PALIA ON CLINICAL EXAMINATION : Partially sighted. Right eye -blind. Left eye aphakia noted. Iridectomy done. Vision fairly satisfactory. Hard of hearing. Scoliosis of spine noted. Difficulty in walking- required complete assistance at all times. Cardiomegaly noted. B.P. 150/90. Systolic murmer at apex noted. No oedema of feet. JVP + No C.C.F. Hypertension controlled by tablet Normace 1daily OPINION : Inspite of her physical disability due to her age (90 years) she is well oriented and mentally alest. X-ray suggestive of ? active Koch's. E.S.R Mantoux Test - Positive. Started on recommended anti tubercular line of treatment (checked the drugs) and advised to continue for to total of 6 months. All reports enclosed P N DR.(MRS)P.N. KAVARANA
